data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
An attacking Heerenveen player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 32, Goal! Joey Veerman gives Heerenveen the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 1-0.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Danny Post with Simon Janssen. This is the first substitution made today by Hans De Koning.
At Abe Lenstra Stadion, Sherel Floranus has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Vito Van Crooij is booked for the away team.
In the minute 63, Tobias Pachonik Venlo.
Rami Hajal is replacing Oliver Batista Meier for Heerenveen at Abe Lenstra Stadion.
Stan Van Dijck is replacing Guus Hupperts for the away team.
In the minute 68, Hans De Koning (Venlo) is making a third substitution, with Jafar Arias replacing Joshua John.
Simon Janssen (Venlo) has been shown a straight red card by referee Kevin Blom.
The home team has substituted Arjen Van Der Heide with Couhaib Driouech. Johnny Jansen is thus making his third change.
In the minute 82, Johnny Jansen is making the team's second substitution at Abe Lenstra Stadion with Ibrahim Dresevic replacing Joey Veerman.
